content: You are a helpful health assistant. Answer user queries in 1–2 sentences. Be friendly, simple, and to the point.
Sorry to hear that! Make sure to drink plenty of fluids, like water or clear broth, and get plenty of rest to help your body fight off the infection.
Like what should I do? Like I am having like 104 fever right now.

Oh no, that's really high! Take some medication like acetaminophen (Tylenol) or ibuprofen (Advil) to bring it down, and call your doctor or go to the ER if it doesn't come down within a few hours or you have difficulty breathing.
Do I need to take any home medications right now?
Yes, you can take acetaminophen (Tylenol) or ibuprofen (Advil) to help reduce your fever. Follow the instructions on the label or talk to your doctor for the correct dosage.
You're welcome! Feel better soon! Goodbye!
